title: Eye of Greed
description: Every 20th tear fired will also fire a golden coin tear at the same time. This tear turns enemies to gold for a few seconds and causes them to drop 1-4 coins if killed while golden (similar to the Midas' Touch item)
When the Midas Touch tear effect triggers, it will remove 1 coin from your current total
The golden tear deals double your tear damage
The effect can still trigger even if you have no held coins
